description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, and Chinese.  Download the manual for this game by going to https://help.ea.com/en/tag/manuals and selecting your title from the Product drop down menu.  Welcome to Redview County, where a street-racing rivalry between cops and racers never stops as both sides compete in an all-out war featuring the fastest cars, mods and technology in a gritty open road environment.  Play as either a cop or racer, where each side of the law has its own set of high stakes challenges, rewards and consequences. Risk everything in the ultimate high stakes rivalry.
description.short: Welcome to Redview County, a gritty open road environment where the intensity of the street's ultimate rivalry between cops and racers never stops
